description: Azure Cache Redis Premium plan having 1) Memory Utilization less than Azure Cache Redis Standard plan max Memory size 2) Zone redundancy not enabled 3) Redis data persistence not enabled 4) Redis cluster not enabled 5) Virtual Network not been used 6) Geo Replication(Passive) not enabled 7) The number of connected clients are less than the maximum number of client connections supported by Standard are recommended to be converted to Azure Cache Redis Standard plan to save cost.
display_name: Azure Cache Redis Premium To Standard Recommend
name: AZURE_CACHE_REDIS_PREMIUM_TO_STANDARD_RECOMMEND
